com.orchestranetworks.workflow Provides classes and interfaces for implementing workflow processes and invoking them.

 interface WorkflowTriggerWorkItemAuthenticatedContext
          Context for handling events related to a workflow work item in an authenticated user session.
 interface WorkflowTriggerWorkItemContext
          Context for handling events related to a workflow work item.
